mapper.insert: insert into TBL_CLASS_BOARD (CLASS_NUMBER, CLASS_TITLE, CLASS_START_DATE, CLASS_END_DATE, CLASS_PROCESS, CLASS_PRICE, CLASS_ADDRESS, CLASS_MAJOR, CLASS_INTRODUCE, CLASS_PLAN, CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, CLASS_LEVEL, CLASS_UPDATE_DATE, USER_NUMBER) values (SEQ_CLASS_NUMBER.NEXTVAL,#{classTitle},#{classStartDate},#{classEndDate},#{classProcess},#{classPrice}, #{classAddress},#{classMajor},#{classIntroduce},#{classPlan},sysdate,0,sysdate,6)
mapper.select: SELECT CB.CLASS_NUMBER, CB.CLASS_TITLE, CB.CLASS_START_DATE, CB.CLASS_END_DATE, CB.CLASS_PROCESS, CB.CLASS_PRICE, CB.CLASS_ADDRESS, CB.CLASS_MAJOR, CB.CLASS_INTRODUCE, CB.CLASS_PLAN, CB.CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, CB.CLASS_LEVEL, CB.CLASS_UPDATE_DATE, CB.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_LEVEL, MA.APPLY_EDUCATION FROM TBL_CLASS_BOARD CB JOIN TBL_USERS U ON CB.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMTO_APPLY MA ON U.USER_NUMBER = MA.USER_NUMBER
